component.name: userLookupDialog
component.script:
sub init() m.top.title = "Find User" m.baseDescription = "Enter the username of a SmugMug user to view" m.top.message = m.baseDescription
m.top.buttons = ["OK", "Cancel"] m.top.observeField("buttonSelected", "onButton")
m.uriFetcher = m.global.uriFetcher
end sub
function onUserDetails(msg as object) ' luckily we can just use the http status code if msg.getData().code = 404 m.top.graphicUri = invalid m.top.message = "Unable to find user " + m.top.text + chr(10) + m.baseDescription else m.top.selectedUser = m.top.text.trim() m.top.close = true end if end function
function onButton(msg as object) if msg.getData() = 0 'lookup the user m.top.graphicUri = "pkg:/images/spinner-icon.png" signer = RequestSigner(m.global.creds) reqParams = { uri: m.global.apiUrl + "/api/v2/user/" + m.top.text.trim().escape() + "?_filter=Name", accept: "application/json" }
ctx = createObject("roSGNode", "Node") ctx.addFields({parameters: reqParams, response: {}}) ctx.observeField("response", "onUserDetails") m.uriFetcher.request = {context: ctx} else m.top.close = true end if end function
